content: the ruffle tree ornament adds a touch of elegance and whimsy to your holiday decor ruffle tree crochet along video right hand wreath https //youtu be/s6rw1tgk9i4 left hand wreath https //youtu be/_ddtg8wu5sw beginners to advanced crocheters can create this pattern with the following techniques -magic_ring -single_crochet single_crochet -single_crochet increase increase -half_double_crochet half_double_crochet -fastening off the pattern is written in u s crochet terms complete with clear instructions and video tutorial to help you along the way ruffle tree is crocheted in continuous spirals without joining the rounds i suggest using a stitch marker or different color yarn to keep track of each round ruffle tree is crocheted in worsted weight yarn and is approximately 3 inches tall be aware that size may vary depending on the yarn and hook size used gauge is not particularly important just be consistent with the gauge you are using and most importantly have fun supplies needed for this pattern worsted weight yarn - you can use a 5 bulky weight yarn and an h hook to make a tabletop pattern i would not suggest any larger weight yarn e 3 5mm crochet hook yarn/darning needle scissors locking stitch markers chiffon ribbon -1 inch wide optional fabric glue optional join my ravelry group so i can get to know you better https //www ravelry com/groups/yarn-society do not distribute sell or share this pattern please feel free to sell the items you make from this shop
